description:
Head of the Funaki dojo in Nissaka and an acclaimed swordsman in his own right. He once fought a demonstration match against Kogan, in front of the shogun, during which Kogan destroyed part of his chin. While the victory was Kogan`s, the lord of the castle felt that Kogan`s actions were rude, leading Kogan to hold a grudge against Funaki.
His sons are the twins Hyouma and Kazuma.
name: Funaki Ichidensai
